Type Method# buildBlock(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
static func buildBlock<A0, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6>(
    _ a0: A0,
    _ a1: A1,
    _ a2: A2,
    _ a3: A3,
    _ a4: A4,
    _ a5: A5,
    _ a6: A6
) -> TupleIntentPrediction<A0.Intent, (A0, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6)> where Intent == A0.Intent, A0 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A1 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A2 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A3 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A4 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A5 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A6 : IntentPredictionConfiguration, A0.Intent == A1.Intent, A1.Intent == A2.Intent, A2.Intent == A3.Intent, A3.Intent == A4.Intent, A4.Intent == A5.Intent, A5.Intent == A6.Intent
```

Available when `Intent` conforms to `AppIntent`.
